tasks.title: Implement Streaming UI for AI Test Step Generation
tasks.description: Replace the current 'all-or-nothing' loading state with a streaming response for `generateTestSteps` to improve perceived latency and user experience.

tasks.title: Add Feedback Mechanism for AI Generation
tasks.description: Implement Thumbs Up/Down buttons for generated test cases to collect data on model performance and enable future RLHF.

tasks.title: Enhance Error Handling for AI Actions
tasks.description: Improve `app/actions.ts` and frontend components to handle API errors gracefully (e.g., quota exceeded, network issues) with user-friendly toast notifications instead of crashes.

tasks.title: Implement recommendations from Technical Review
tasks.description:
Address the following points from the technical review:
1. Add input validation using a library like Zod for API request bodies in `app/api/*` routes to prevent bad data.
2. Strengthen AI parsing in `app/actions.ts` by adding a fallback mechanism to strip Markdown code blocks before parsing.
3. Initialize testing by adding a basic test script (e.g., Vitest) to unit test utility functions and Store logic.

tasks.title: Implement TestPlan and TestRun Core Entities
tasks.description:
Introduce `TestPlan` and `TestRun` entities to the Prisma schema to support test cycles and versioning.
- Schema changes: `TestPlan` (1) -> (n) `TestRun` (1) -> (n) `ExecutionRecord`.
- UI changes: Add 'Create Test Plan' page, allowing users to select multiple test cases to form a 'package' for execution.
- Why: To enable professional testing workflows (e.g., 'v1.2 Regression', 'v2.0 Smoke Test') and tracking.

tasks.title: Implement CSV/Excel Import and Export
tasks.description:
Add functionality to import and export test cases using CSV or Excel formats.
- Why: To solve the 'slow start' problem and allow users to migrate existing assets.
- Scope: Basic import/export logic and UI.

tasks.title: Implement Test Case Versioning
tasks.description:
Add version control for test cases to prevent data loss and ensure auditability.
- Current behavior: Updates overwrite existing data.
- New behavior: Create new versions on update, preserving history.
- Why: Critical for regulated industries (Finance/Medical) to prove 'tested against requirements at time X'.

tasks.title: Implement Bulk Operations for Test Cases
tasks.description:
Add ability to perform bulk actions on test cases (e.g., change priority, move to different suite, delete).
- Why: To improve operational efficiency when managing large numbers of test cases (>50).

tasks.title: Enhance Collaboration and User Management
tasks.description:
Improve the user model and collaboration features.
- Current: `authorId` and `assignedToId` are simple strings.
- Change: Introduce a proper `User` model (or integrate with auth provider) and create relationships.
- Features: Enable 'My Tasks' panel, assignment notifications.
